g.text: Azure AD Premium Plan 2(includes Plan 1 features)
FastTrack helps customers deploy Microsoft 365. Customers with 150+ eligible licenses can use FastTrack at no additional cost for the life of their subscription.
Limitations: 路Users cannot be administrators. 路No Skype desktop or app sharing. 路Cannot schedule Skype meetings. 路No access to productivity servers.
Microsoft 365 F3 includes Windows 10 E3except:Long Term Servicing Channel (LTSC) and Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP).

text.tspan: No Skype desktop or app sharing.

g.text: Complete learning management platform in Teams
More sophisticated surveys and customer feedback
Split a tenancy over multiple geographies
More capacity and scale for business intelligence
Additional capacity for Microsoft Search and Graph
Built-in long-term storage of audit logging data
On-prem, multi-cloud, and SaaS data governance
Cloud PBX functionality to enable PSTN calling
Schedule meetings with the help of Cortana
